title: Understanding SQL Clauses
text: In SQL, a clause is a part of a query that performs a specific function. Common clauses include SELECT, FROM, WHERE, GROUP BY, HAVING, and ORDER BY.

title: Identify the Clauses
text: How many clauses are present in the following SQL statement? - SELECT Name, Age FROM Employees WHERE $$Department='HR'$$ GROUP BY Age HAVING COUNT(*)>1;
